data.system_settings: ASUS Zenfone max pro m1 Android 8.1.0
data.actual_result: Shows "account settings have been successfully updated" toast and changes avatar back to the old one
data.expected_result: Should show you the same rate limit toast
data.short_description: "Account settings updated successfully" toast when changing profile picture after hitting the limit
data.steps_to_repro: - Change pfp continuously until you hit the limit  - Go to settings > my account > remove (under Current pfp) this would bring you to the default avatar - Hit save (this would show the toast that you're changing profile pictures too quickly) - Hit save again
